Body:
"""Set math channel, derivative operator."""
with expected_protocol(ik.teledyne.MAUI, [init,
    "F1:DEFINE EQN,'DERI(C1)',VERSCALE,1000000.0,VEROFFSET,0,ENABLEAUTOSCALE,ON"
    ,
    "F1:DEFINE EQN,'DERI(C3)',VERSCALE,5.0,VEROFFSET,1.0,ENABLEAUTOSCALE,OFF"
    ], [], sep='\n') as osc:
    osc.math[0].operator.derivative(0)
    osc.math[0].operator.derivative(2, vscale=u.Quantity(5000, u.mV / u.s),
        voffset=u.Quantity(60, u.V / u.min), autoscale=False)
